original_title: Namal Rajapaksa holds talks with Yogi Adityanath
original_body_lines: India, Feb 10 -  SLPP MP Namal Rajapaksa who is presently in India on a two-day visit held discussions with BJP member and Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh, Yogi Adityanath and several senior Indian officials.
Namal is presently in India on a two-day private visit to Uttar Pradesh to attend a pooja in the Ayodhya Ram Temple.
